com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui

Class SpenSettingPenLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.RelativeLayout
          • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui.SpenSettingPenLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, ViewManager, ViewParent

    public class SpenSettingPenLayout
extends RelativeLayout
    This class provides the methods for managing Pen settings layout.
    Since:
    3.0.0

      This listener interface provides callback methods for Pen settings visibility changed events.

        @Deprecated
public static final int VIEW_MODE_NORMAL

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenSettingPenLayout

        public SpenSettingPenLayout(Context context,
                            String customImagePath,
                            RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
        Creates an @see SpenSettingPenLayout instance with the specified image file path and relative layout.

        The following parameters must be not null.
        Pen Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.

        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application.
        customImagePath - [in] The path to the image you want to use internally (String)
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • SpenSettingPenLayout

        @Deprecated
public SpenSettingPenLayout(Context context,
                                         String customImagePath,
                                         RelativeLayout relativeLayout,
                                         float ratio)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is deprecated in version 4.0.0. Not supported anymore.
        please use SpenSettingPenLayout(Context, String, RelativeLayout).
        Since:
        3.0.0

        Since:

      • setInfo

        public void setInfo(SpenSettingPenInfo settingInfo)
        Set the specified Pen settings information. The UI is refreshed according to this value.

        Pen settings information must be not null. List pen supported is : FountainPen, ObliquePen, InkPen, Pencil2, BrushPen, Marker (in SDK version 5.0)

        Parameters:
        settingInfo - The Pen settings information object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the info is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setPenInfoList

        public void setPenInfoList(List<SpenSettingPenInfo> list)
        set up the pen setting infomation list 

         ArrayList tempPenInfoList = new ArrayList();
 List mPenList = new ArrayList();

 mPenManager.getInfoList(mPenList);

 int penCount = mPenList.size();
 int penInfoCount = mPenInfoList.size();

 for (int i = 0; i < mPenList.size(); i++) {
 PenInfo penInfo = mPenList.get(i);

 SpenSettingPenInfo info = new SpenSettingPenInfo();
 info.alpha = mPen.getAlpha();
 info.color = -16777216;
 info.advancedSetting = "";
 info.isCurvable = true;
 info.name = penInfo.className;
 info.size = mPen.getSize();
 tempPenInfoList.add(info);

 mSettingViewInterface.setPenSettingInfo(info);

 }

 mPenSettingView.setPenInfoList(tempPenInfoList);
        Parameters:
        list - List The list of Pen settings infomation.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • removePen

        public void removePen(int penIndex)
        Remove the Pen with the specified index. If there is only one pen remained, pen is not removed. Functions to support so as not to use a pen from the pen settings UI
        Parameters:
        penIndex - The index of the pen.
        Since:
        3.0.0
